div.span: All Spartanburg One schools are closed through the end of April 2020, per state mandate. Please visit our COVID-19 page for important updates and resources throughout school closure.

div.div: Physical Address: 121 Wheeler Street Campobello, SC 29322 | Phone: (864) 472-2846 | Fax: (864) 472-4118
